etymology.description: pictogram: depicts a stand/table with a horizontal board over a vertical support.
etymology.interpretation: A stylized drawing of a tabletop with a central support conveys the idea of a small stand or altar. Early forms show a horizontal board above a vertical post, aligning with the meanings 'stand; table'.

examples.chinese: 他把器皿放在丌上(他把器皿放在丌上)。
examples.pinyin: Tā bǎ qìmǐn fàng zài jī shàng.
examples.english: He put the utensils on the stand.

examples.chinese: 祭司立于丌旁(祭司立於丌旁)。
examples.english: The priest stood beside the altar table.

examples.chinese: 博物馆展出了一张古丌(博物館展出了一張古丌)。
examples.pinyin: Bówùguǎn zhǎnchūle yì zhāng gǔ jī.
examples.english: The museum displayed an ancient stand.
